description:
Alice is an alchemist and http://anidb.net/ch90554 [Renfred]`s apprentice. A former street urchin, drug abuser and drug seller, Renfred discovered her innate magic potential and took her in as an apprentice, hence her devotion towards him. Despite a few rough meetings with http://anidb.net/ch80778 [Chise], because of their similar circumstances and having been saved by her, she ends up befriending her.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Alice Swayne
